meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>baseball base</kanji> <kanji>judge</kanji> is one who judges things on a baseball field. This is a <vocabulary>baseball umpire</vocabulary>, or more simply, an <vocabulary>umpire</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
